Topic.Title: Question about how to publish game

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, my name is Andy and I'm a newbie.
How can I publish my game and play online on my own webpage?
Many thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hello, my name is Andy and I'm a newbie.
How can I publish my game and play online on my own webpage?
Many thanks.

Posts.EditableText: You need to have Quest running on the webserver. So you can either publish it on this site and link to it from your own site; or you can install Quest on your own server (which is a big task, but I think a few people have managed it now)
Posts.HTML: You need to have Quest running on the webserver. So you can either publish it on this site and link to it from your own site; or you can install Quest on your own server (which is a big task, but I think a few people have managed it now)

Posts.EditableText: Ok, if I want to sell my game in itch.io, for example, I could to publish my game as private in quest website and give the link to my customers in itch.io?
Posts.HTML: Ok, if I want to sell my game in itch.io, for example, I could to publish my game as private in quest website and give the link to my customers in itch.io?
